name: Brayden Land Unite
description:
Brayden Land Unite is a game to play with friends where you make levels and play with friends since you can't much at this time.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move or WASD.

Space to jump

Click to spawn or destroy block

1-9 ground blocks

Note: The level editor doesn't work yet for online multiplayer. I have tried and tried but I sadly couldn't. It will be added in the future!
